message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $12,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Given its worth to you stands at $8,000, I am prepared to negotiate a fair deal. Considering the quality and benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000. This allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
